messages.message:
What are the differences between env vars configs in these 3 files:
• webserver/api-server-apps/deployment/env/deployment-config.json
• deployment-configs/base/api-server-apps.yml
• tools/releasetools/security/aqua/image-scanner/test/input/subdir/api-server-apps.yml
Thanks! :thankyou:
`deployment-configs/base/api-server-apps.yml` is used for all environments deployed with Control Plane
`webserver/api-server-apps/deployment/env/deployment-config.json` is used for environments not deployed with Control Plane and is also used for our local envs
`tools/releasetools/security/aqua/image-scanner/test/input/subdir/api-server-apps.yml` is used for vulnerability scanning, i believe, but i’m not as familiar with this use case
